function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate messaging about the impact of COVID-19 on conservation efforts","Impact":"Misinformation and lack of awareness about the impact of COVID-19 on conservation","Mitigation":"Enhancing messaging and communication about the impacts of COVID-19 on conservation efforts","Technologies":"Digital communication platforms, social media, and data visualization tools","People":"Communities, conservation organizations, and researchers","Owner":"Conservation organizations and communication experts"},{"Description":"Reliance on large visitor numbers for funding sustainable tourism","Impact":"Vulnerability to disruptions in visitor numbers due to pandemics or other crises","Mitigation":"Promoting sustainable funding models that do not rely solely on large visitor numbers, and incentivizing local benefits","Technologies":"Online booking platforms, virtual tourism, and sustainable finance models","People":"Local communities, conservation organizations, and tourism industry stakeholders","Owner":"Conservation organizations, tourism industry, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate adoption of new technologies and techniques for public engagement, tourism, and research","Impact":"Reduced ability to engage the public, maintain tourism income, and deliver conservation messaging","Mitigation":"Adopting innovative technologies such as artificial intelligence, machine learning, and digital platforms for data collection and processing","Technologies":"Artificial intelligence, machine learning, digital engagement platforms","People":"Conservation organizations, tourism industry, and researchers","Owner":"Conservation organizations and technology experts"}]}
